dcterms:creator: P. Bergmann
M. Fauser
D. Sattlegger
C. Steger
dcterms:description: MVTec AD is a comprehensive real-world dataset for unsupervised anomaly detection, consisting of 15 categories of industrial products with a total of 5,354 images. Each category includes a training set of anomaly-free samples and a test set containing both anomaly-free and anomalous samples, with ground-truth masks provided for anomaly localization.
dcterms:title: MVTec AD

dcterms:creator: P. Mishra
R. Verk
D. Fornasier
C. Piciarelli
G. L. Foresti
dcterms:description: BeanTech Anomaly Detection (BTAD) contains three categories of industrial products with a total of 2,540 samples. The dataset includes a training set of only anomaly-free samples and a test set with both anomaly-free and anomalous samples, along with ground-truth masks for evaluation.
dcterms:title: BeanTech Anomaly Detection (BTAD)

dcterms:creator: Y. Huang
C. Qiu
K. Yuan
dcterms:description: Magnetic Tile Defect (MTD) consists of 925 defect-free magnetic tile images and 392 anomalous images, with varied illumination levels and image sizes. The dataset is used for evaluating anomaly detection methods, with a focus on industrial applications.
dcterms:title: Magnetic Tile Defect (MTD)
